title: Serious wards bug in the game!! Please take attention!
body: During I was spectating game, I found many places in the bush that people placed the vision ward can't see enemy's stealth wards. The screen shot just show one case. {{champion:103}}  placed the vision ward in the bush cannot see enemy's stealth ward. Also when I was switching the view to both sides, they cannot see both types of wards of each other. Not just that place, I have seen many places like the bush near red buff. This is a very serious bug!! Place take attention.

replies.body: None of that is fixed. That is so ridiculous!

Wards have been buggy ever since they were reworked. Good luck ever finding a patch where they function perfectly.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
